r.s: Class to build Mozilla XUL applications.
r.d: The XML User Interface Language (XUL) is a markup language for describing user interfaces. With XUL you can create rich, sophisticated cross-platform web applications easily. XML_XUL provides a API similar to DOM to create XUL applications. There's a PHP object for each XUL element, and the more complex widgets like grids, trees and tabboxes can easily be created with these objects.
r.n: added XML_XUL::loadString(), added XML_XUL::loadFile(), added XML_XUL_Parser class
